<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"cancelOrder"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/cancelOrder"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



:::note
- Request for a base64-encoded unsigned trigger order cancellation transaction to be used in `POST /trigger/v1/execute`
- Refer to [Trigger API doc](/docs/trigger-api/cancel-order) for more information
:::

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"maker":{"type":"string"},"order":{"type":"string"},"computeUnitPrice":{"type":"string","default":"auto","description":"In microlamports, defaults to 95th percentile of priority fees\n"}},"required":["maker","order"],"example":{"maker":"devjnEpxbJUhJ39FSsFz7YPerr5bdxN8VWUXvfbFUK4","order":"6fe8ByaiFHisjnYnH5qdpyiNtkn89mMBQUemRkVmKhro","computeUnitPrice":"auto"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
